Department of English

 General English course is offered to I &II year students. The department of English enables the learners to take the Part II English examination for four semesters successfully by guiding them and training them in the four skills of English language. The department encourages and guides the learners to take the various tests conducted by the Shakespeare Institute of English Studies, Chennai, every year, successfully. With a funding of UGC career oriented certificate course in Journalism was offered by the department, during the period of 2012-17.

   The department conducts Remedial Teaching classes for slow learners and poor learners. The functioning of a Literary Forum, an important activity of the department, enables the students to participate in various competitions at University level and helps the students to develop their extra curricular interests and talents. Regular teaching programmes, a part of the extension activity is conducted by the members of Literary Forum in schools, in and around Alwarkurichi. Students are also trained to write articles in English and also translation of Tamil words. A regular practice of writing curriculam Vitae through online, is also encouraged and proper training is also given.
